283460f1-e21d-4671-aced-1d15284d4c1e.name: Directional
283460f1-e21d-4671-aced-1d15284d4c1e.notes: @Direction: Back, Right, Left, Top or Underside@

9968f034-9111-42a8-a521-3080354db47d.name: Tough Skin
9968f034-9111-42a8-a521-3080354db47d.notes: Effects that just require skin contact or a scratch ignore this DR

04a6ddf5-d93c-437e-a3c2-d017ff3d8688.name: Partial (@Location, 1 level per -1 Per Hit Modifier, Torso is -10% thus level 1@)

10e9f26f-9bbf-46af-80df-af942335ad54.name: Oxygen Storage
10e9f26f-9bbf-46af-80df-af942335ad54.notes: Can hold breath 25 times as long as normal

77b9afcc-04f9-48ac-bed9-b831b3da9d37.name: Oxygen Storage
77b9afcc-04f9-48ac-bed9-b831b3da9d37.notes: Can hold breath 50 times as long as normal

07ac40d7-96ea-4675-ac7f-2b1119deb36a.name: Oxygen Storage
07ac40d7-96ea-4675-ac7f-2b1119deb36a.notes: Can hold breath 100 times as long as normal

998229d5-335c-43d3-a2a2-482f9021d507.name: Oxygen Storage
998229d5-335c-43d3-a2a2-482f9021d507.notes: Can hold breath 200 times as long as normal

6f09ea6b-1d6e-454b-83a0-5269634275da.name: Oxygen Storage
6f09ea6b-1d6e-454b-83a0-5269634275da.notes: Can hold breath 300 times as long as normal

97a9c356-1c81-4244-bfce-5e6b89586b44.name: Diffuse
97a9c356-1c81-4244-bfce-5e6b89586b44.notes: Immune to crippling injuries. Brain, Vitals and Groin cannot be targeted. Most foes cannot slam or grapple you (GM's decision). Do not bleed. Unaffected by blood-borne toxins. Immune to attacks that rely on cutting off blood to part of your body. Impaling and piercing attacks of any size never do more than 1 HP of injury, regardless of penetrating damage. Other attacks never do more than 2 HP of injury. Exception: Area-effect, cone, and explosion attacks cause normal injury

0b6bce1e-155e-433b-ad50-86e1bab7b1ee.name: Homogenous
0b6bce1e-155e-433b-ad50-86e1bab7b1ee.notes: Altered wound modifiers: imp & pi++ are x1/2, pi+ is x1/3, pi is x1/5, pi- is x1/10

bb717c1b-3e52-4dec-a00c-741ba61e036b.name: No Blood
bb717c1b-3e52-4dec-a00c-741ba61e036b.notes: Do not bleed, unaffected by blood-borne toxins, immune to attacks that rely on cutting off blood to part of your body

52b8d34d-4b90-40e4-804e-25e839afdc31.name: No Brain
52b8d34d-4b90-40e4-804e-25e839afdc31.notes: Brain cannot be targeted. Blows to the skull or eye are treated like blows to the face, except that eye injury can still cripple the eye

8de7c358-22f6-44be-b662-524fdabd7d54.name: No Eyes
8de7c358-22f6-44be-b662-524fdabd7d54.notes: Eyes may not be targeted. Immune to blinding attacks

7a9f9da4-3bb2-48bd-9bcb-e421dc20cc3e.name: No Head
7a9f9da4-3bb2-48bd-9bcb-e421dc20cc3e.notes: Skull, Brain and Face cannot be targeted

2a8aef05-4589-4e85-ae9a-53bd77ea0246.name: No Neck
2a8aef05-4589-4e85-ae9a-53bd77ea0246.notes: Neck may not be targeted and cannot be decapitated, choked or strangled

80954ad6-e51d-48dc-9235-f16640f641f2.name: No Vitals
80954ad6-e51d-48dc-9235-f16640f641f2.notes: Attacks to the Vitals or Groin are treated as attacks to the Torso

342a9fd4-9f9b-4963-8cbd-acd9753e8a3c.name: Unliving
342a9fd4-9f9b-4963-8cbd-acd9753e8a3c.notes: Altered wound modifiers: imp & pi++ are x1, pi+ is x1/2, pi is x1/3, pi- is x1/5
